chapters.title: Chapter 13:  Wonderful News
chapters.info: Irgain Fatamed, p. 310 (352)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She was stilled by Rand during the battle at Dumai's Wells. One of her Warders died from the shock; the other died while killing Aiel, making no attempt to escape. She has since been Healed by Damer Flinn.
